# **Basic greetings (time & politeness)**

In French, greetings are very important. People usually greet each other before starting a conversation, even with strangers. A simple greeting shows politeness and respect. The greeting you choose often depends on the time of day and how formal the situation is. Learning a few basic greetings is the first step toward speaking French naturally.
